denoConfig.description: Path to the Deno configuration file.

check.description: Run type checking for the project

coverageDirectory.description: Directory where coverage reports are output

cert.description: Load certificate authority from PEM encoded file

failFast.description: Stop after N failures. Defaults to stopping after the first failure if no number is provided

filter.description: Run tests with this string or pattern in the test name

ignore.description: Comma seperated list of files paths

inspect.description: Activate inspector on host:port, wait for debugger to connect before running user code. Defaults to 127.0.0.1:9229 if no host:port is provided

location.description: value of 'globalThis.location', use by web APIs

parallel.description: Run tests in parallel. Parallelism defaults to the number of avalible CPUs. If a number is provided then that value will be set the DENO_JOBS environment variable.

seed.description: set the random number generator seed

suffle.description: Shuffle the order in which the tests are run
